pkgmetadata.longdescription: Explore NOAA Storm Events Database // Allows users to explore and plot data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Storm Events database through R for United States counties. Functionality includes matching storm event listings by time and location to hurricane best tracks data. This work was supported by grants from the Colorado Water Center, the National Institute of Environmental Health Sciences (R00ES022631) and the National Science Foundation (1331399).
